article:
A group of frogs were traveling _ the woods when two of them fell into a deep pit  . All the other frogs gathered around the pit. When they saw how deep the pit was, they told the _ frogs that they were as _ as dead. The two frogs ignored _ words and tried to jump out of the pit with all of their might. the other frogs kept telling them to stop, that they were as good as dead.
 _ , one of the frogs listened to what the other frogs were saying and gave up. He fell down and died. The other frog _ to jump as hard as he could.
Once again, the crowd of frogs shouted at him to give up and wait for death.
He jumped even harder and finally _ it out. When he got out, the other frogs asked: "Did you not hear us?"
To their _ , the frog explained to them _ he was almost deaf. He thought they were encouraging him the whole time.
Words have the power of _ and death. An encouraging word spoken to someone who is _ can lift them up and help them make it through their difficulties.
A destructive   word to someone _ is down can be fatal  . So _ be careful of what you say.
